properties.description: The policy detects IAM users across your AWS accounts, a practice that should be kept only for a small number of accounts. This is a default definition by Authomize and can be updated using the edit modal.
properties.name: Detect AWS IAM Users

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Detect AWS IAM Users. The policy detects IAM users across your AWS accounts, a practice that should be kept only for a small number of accounts. This is a default definition by Authomize and can be updated using the edit modal.
alertDetailsOverride.alertnameFormat: Alert from Authomize - Detect AWS IAM Users

properties.query:
Authomize_v2_CL
| where ingestion_time() >= ago(30m)
| extend EventID = id_s, Policy = policy_name_s, Severity = severity_s,Description = description_s,Recommendation = recommendation_s,URL = url_s,Tactics = tactics_s
| where Policy has "Detect AWS IAM Users"
| project  EventID, Policy, Severity, Description, Recommendation, URL, Category, Tactics
